org.lenskit.eval.traintest.metrics

Interface Discount

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExponentialDiscount, LogDiscount

    public interface Discount

    Interface for discounts for rank evaluation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double discount(int rank)
      Compute the discount for a rank.

    • Method Detail

      • discount

        double discount(int rank)

        Compute the discount for a rank.

        Parameters:
        rank - The rank (with the first item having rank 1).
        Returns:
        The discount. This discount will be multiplied by the value, so it should generally go towards 0 as the rank increases.
